professional_summary: Database Administrator with over 5 years of experience in Oracle database management, including SQL, RMAN, and performance tuning. Expertise in Linux/Unix systems and database tools like Toad and OEM.

key_responsibilities: Installed and configured Oracle databases on various platforms.
Performed regular maintenance and tuning for optimal performance.
Developed and implemented backup strategies using RMAN.
Provided comprehensive database support for large-scale applications.
Monitored and analyzed performance metrics to optimize database operations.
Resolved complex issues related to database crashes and corruption.
